headline: AI’s Big Leaps Are Slowing. That Could Be a Good Thing.
summary: A regular cadence of more impressive large language models from startups and big tech companies alike has kept the party going, lifting stocks—including shares of AI-chip giant  Nvidia  —to lofty heights.  That difficulty—a thorny management challenge as much as a technical one—means corporate AI adoption will be a multidecade effort, Chui says.
